page.description: The return value is the value that is returned after a user makes a selection from the list control. The return value type property has three options: Field, PrimaryKey, and Expression.

section.title: PrimaryKey
section.description: The primary key for list controls with a SQL data source type is set in the 'Primary key' property in the SQL Data Source section. A return value type of primary key is often used when a list control has a detail view.
